short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps people to maintain healthy habits while using their computers. Regular Blink, Exercise, and On Task Reminders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you a customizable way to maintain healthy habits while using your computer. Use of computers without regular reminders to blink is a large cause of dry eyes. Use of computers can lead to a sedentary lifestyle. Finally, use of computers can often make you distracted and lose time you intend to spend on other things in life. This app will help remind you to blink regularly, exercise regularly, and stay on task.
